Detailed Description

Abstract class representing a generic robot.

This class hold all information associated with a robot: joints, connection status and information about the specific model. It serves as base class for model specific implementations and handles publishing information on ROS topics and services as well as listening to ROS topics for commands.

Definition at line 11 of file Robot.h.

const uint8_t  moduleIndex,
const uint8_t  channelIndex,
const std::string &  name 
)
protected

Define and name a new input channel.

Parameters
onSeperateModuleSet to true if the channel is controlled from a DIN-rail module not associated with a joint.
moduleIndexIndex of the joint or DIN-rail module controlling the digital input.
channelIndexIndex of the channel on the respective control module.
nameThe name that should be given to the input channel.
Returns
The ID of the newly defined digital input.
